name: Coconut Kush
text: They deliver to your house they will bring right out of oven our meals was still fresh and warm at right temperature! Great food would recommend again!!

name: LaTasha Reed
text: I was watching the young prepare orders while I sat  in the parking lot.  She was extremely careful to even with wearing gloves. She took the plastic bag, turnt it inside out and grabbed the lettuce and tomato without even touching the â€¦More

name: Brandi Ridge
text: Highly recommend Hungry Howie's! Had them cater our sons birthday and the pizza was a hit. Super nice and helpful staff. Thanks Chris ðŸ˜„

name: Tony P
text: Everything here is delicious.  I especially enjoy the Italian Sub and the Antipasto Salad.

name: jane patterson
text: Very nice, sweet employee brought my pizza right to my car!

name: Clinton Coddington
text: The best pizza I've ever eaten

name: Maria
text: Better pizza than Domino's and Pizza Hut. Great deals too. I got a large 1 topping for $5.99, that's a steal!

name: Heather Reed
text: They always have great customer service and great product!

name: timothy brister
text: Great flavored crust, and great pizza. My order has always been correct!

name: mario andres
text: The service is good, the pizza is okay, the place looks clean, the employees are nice, the pizza is done fast. Can't complain. If you want a pizza for a budget this can be your choice. It's on a decent location, very accessible. Not my favorite but not bad.

name: Revizion
text: The food was ok and the service was great. We will definitely be coming back. <3

name: Ashley Holbrook
text: Fantastic pizza! And it was really fast service

name: Mama Bri
text: Staff are always friendly & food is ALWAYS consistent in taste and quality ðŸ˜Š

name: Timothy Morton
text: This place is a hit or miss with how friendly the staff is and/or how great the pizza taste. I hate to give this type of review.

name: Andrew Fulp
text:
I always ask for my food well done they never listen I always ask for red pepper an they never bring it.
I dont know why I can't get what i pay for. â€¦More

name: Stacey M
text: My son is an employee at Hungry Howies. He was in a car accident today and the owner, Roger, went to the scene to check on him. It is so comforting to know that a supervisor cares enough about his employees to be there with them in a time â€¦More

name: David Pickel
text: Great Pizza, great price, my son eats the gluten free pizza.

name: Charica Crews
text: Julia was extremely nice,and helpful. Thanks!!!

name: John Thompson
text: To pricey for my taste. 2 Large Pepperoni stuffed crust for 32.64 after tax.... Way to much...

name: Janine
text: Pretty good.  Better than I thought it would be. Will go again.

name: Sirius Holt
text: Gave a 5 star because the food was on point meaning really good. Great jod hungry howie's pizza.

name: Matt Overbay
text: Great pizza and service always

name: Rick Kiddoo
text: Pizza not my issue with this last visit. Order was not ready at pickup time because pizza never got made. My request for a square cut pizza was answered with no problem. How was it cut? Traditional way. Who's in charge around there?

name: Shirl Johnson
text: Good pizza different types of crust to choose from and if service was very nice

name: todd phillip
text: This is a great Hungry Howies location if you like their food.  The service is outstanding here, they have great deals, and the pizza is always consistent.  Whoever runs this place does a good job.

name: Chad Thomas
text: 2 words stuffed crust, but check your food they will give you what's ready and say sorry and here is a free pizza thats what  we can mess up the second time.

name: Melissa Martin
text: We have picked up pizza here several times. I am picky about the sauce and crust  which is why I like theirs best! The staff members are friendly and efficient. We ordered online and opted for delivery this last time. It took around 30 â€¦More

name: Ronald Price
text: I have to be gluten free and they fixed me right up. Thanks

name: Robert Archer
text: Great food reasonable prices

name: Nikki Hartman
text: Great pizza made exact as I requested.   Great customer service!

name: Josh Walter
text: Really happy to see a Hungry Howies on Country Club Rd which is much closer to us!  This place has fantastic pizza, wings and subs.  I was very impressed with the quality of their subs the first time I ordered one.  I've never had a sub â€¦More

name: Lisa Hairston
text: Great pizza  awesome service!!!

name: Marty Hicks
text: Good place to eat when you hungry

name: Ann Boles
text: Good service food was ready in time and excellent.

name: William Montgomery
text: Loved it! Great food! Great people! Ask for Logan! Marvelous personality!

name: Rebekkah Todd
text: UPDATE 2020 THE SANDWICHES ARE AMAZING! ORDER 2 AND GET THE BIG SALAD! YUM! Thank you for the menu change. The sandwiches are incredible!

name: Eric Fuller
text: Decent pizza for a reasonable price.

name: matthew hackman
text: Fast and friendly...not to mention delicious

name: Edie Edie
text: The best pizza I ever had at Hungry Howies in Boone, NC  getting ready to try this one tonight.

name: Darth Bane
text: This place literally has the best pizza that I have ever tasted!  The cheese always has the perfect combination of salty and sweet intermixed, the crust always has amazing flavor no matter which one you choose, and the bread sticks are so good I nearly pass out from the pleasure of eating one.  I totally recommend this restaurant.

name: Josh Martin
text: Great food and a great value

name: Eric Nieves
text: I love this place!

name: Eric Hale
text: Love their steak and cheese sub and pizza.

name: Patches Rush
text: Very fast delivery.  Arrived piping hot ! Very very good

name: Sandy Beauchamp Coleman
text: Best pizza ever

name: Dale Moore
text:
Good chain pizza the variety of crust makes it better.

Menu prices are a little high. But their specials are good.

name: John Morgan
text: Best pizza for the $ and it's not even close. So much better flavor than Dominos, Papa Johns, Pizza Hut, etc.

name: Pat McClearen
text: I ordered a two topping pizza for pickup, when I got there they said,"did someone pay for it?"I said no then they said there wasn't any order,then they said someone had taken it ,then they said again they had not received any order, so I left without a pizza,so they have lost a customer.

name: Robert Jarrett
text: Great pizza at a great price and great service

name: Greg Bodenheimer
text: Great food

name: Suzanne Vogeley
text: Our pizza didn't have flavor beyond the pizza crust.  Too expensive for lack of quality.

name: Venessa Daniels
text: I love the wings...cooked well done!

name: Pamela Moore
text: One of my favorite stores!

name: Tony Kleineick
text: I love hungry howies, other than one or two employees, this place is excellent.

name: Coy Hamilton
text: Good subs

name: Brian Minter
text: $5 two topping deal is perfect for one.  Had one issue with a pizza, manager made it right.
